techmeme.title: Threads announces new features, like the ability to store multiple drafts and an analytics page, rolling out on the web, and plans to test a scheduling feature (Ivan Mehta/TechCrunch)
Klarna debuts a checking account-like service and a cashback offering in its app in 12 markets, including the US and across Europe, as it prepares for a US IPO (Ryan Browne/CNBC)
Some publishers say they can't block the Googlebot crawler that covers AI Overviews, as the crawler also covers Search, which would hamper their discoverability (Bloomberg)
NYC-based Chaos Labs, which offers automated, on-chain risk management for 20+ DeFi protocols, raised a $55M Series A led by Haun Ventures (Sam Kessler/CoinDesk)
Israeli stock research service TipRanks says investment firm Prytek bought 40% of the startup for $80M, giving Prytek an 80% stake; TipRanks has raised $102M (CTech)
